text: Happy Hardcore is a type of dance music. It has a very fast tempo (usually around 160â€“180 BPM). It also normally has solo vocals. It usually features various melodies and basslines which keep playing until the song ends. == Artists, DJs and producers == * Breeze * Darren Styles * Dougal * Gammer * Hixxy * Scott Brown * Sy * S3RL Category:Music genres
